author: cnbc.com
title: Don Schiavone Appointed to Managing Director at CEO Coaching International
text:
NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- CEO Coaching International , the leading firm coaching over 160 of the world's top growth-focused entrepreneurs, is pleased to announce the appointment of Don Schiavone to Managing Director. Schiavone has over 25 years of deep expertise in SaaS business models, professional services, financial services, hi-tech product development, telecom markets and building high-performing company cultures.
"Don is the most talented operating guy I have ever worked with and am thrilled to have him further strengthen CEO Coaching International's best practices, infrastructure and leadership as it continues to coach CEOs around the globe," says Mark Moses, CEO and Founder of CEO Coaching International . With the help of Schiavone, Moses feels CEO Coaching International can further help its clientele unlock their potential with the right tools and the right people.
Sheldon Harris , Chris Larkins and Craig Coleman were also appointed to the CEO Coaching International executive leadership team. Mark Moses will continue to lead the firm as its Chief Executive Officer. Moses is proud to have personally coached each one of the new leadership appointees, as well as coaching Schiavone and his previous business, Grasshopper, for six years.
Prior to joining CEO Coaching International, Schiavone led the rapid growth of Grasshopper, the Entrepreneur's Phone System, beating quarterly business goals for over 21 consecutive quarters and resulting in a highly successful sale of the business to Citrix (over $170 MM sale price).
CEO Coaching International is known globally for its success in coaching growth-focused Entrepreneurs in a data-driven and measurable way to meaningful exits. Their typical clients see year over year growth of 35%.
About CEO Coaching International
CEO Coaching International is an executive coaching company that works with the world's top entrepreneurs, CEOs and companies to dramatically grow their business, develop their people, and elevate their own performance. For more information, please visit: http://www.ceocoachinginternational.com/
